ygData.subject: Shiverback
ygData.msgSnippet: Well after a week in fear, I got 1 bracer, 2 gloves, 2 arms, 2 legs. Most of the time I was the only monk in fear (or even close to fear) so I got to loot
ygData.messageBody:
Well after a week in fear, I got 1 bracer, 2 gloves, 2 arms, 2 legs.
Most of the time I was the only monk in fear (or even close to fear) so
I got to loot whatever dropped, and I got doubles when the corpses were
going to "poof". I got most of it in the first night. The last 2 nights
1 bracer dropped and I let the other monk who was there have it. In the
times I missed, I heard of 2 jerkins and 1 pair of boots dropping.

Only 1 bracer, a jerkin and boots to go. And infact I only want the
boots.

How common are the boots usually ? (weren't very common this last week
;p).

What parts drop off of chests in hate ?
Do the boots drop off phobos ?
